A

AbstractComponent - Class in fr.upmc.components
The class AbstractComponent represents the basic information and methods for components in the component model.
AbstractComponent() - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
create a passive component and initialise the collections of implemented interfaces and the mapping from interfaces to ports.
AbstractComponent(boolean) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
create a passive component if isConcurrent is false, and an active one with only one thread if it is true.
AbstractComponent(int) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
create a passive component if nbThreads is zero, and an active one with nbThreads threads otherwise.
AbstractComponent(boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
create a passive component if both isConcurrent and canScheduleTasks are false, and an active one with only one non schedulable thread if isConcurrent is true and one schedulable thread if canScheduleTasks is true.
AbstractComponent(int, int) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
create a passive component if both nbThreads and nbSchedulableThreads are both zero, and an active one with nbThreads non schedulable thread and nbSchedulableThreads schedulable threads otherwise.
AbstractConnector - Class in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.
AbstractConnector() - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
 
AbstractCVM - Class in fr.upmc.components.cvm
The class AbstractCVM defines the common properties of component virtual machines in the component model.
AbstractCVM() - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
create and initialise a local CVM.
AbstractCVM(boolean) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
create and initialise the CVM, tagged as distributed if the parameter is true, and as local otherwise; note however that distributed CVM must be created as subclasses of the class AbstractDistributedCVM, so this constructor should never be called directly but only through the other constructor of this class or through one of the constructors of AbstractDistributedCVM.

ActiveDataConnector - Class in fr.upmc.components.connectors
The class ActiveBasicDataConnector partially implements an active connector that can be used to connect qctive components in a synchronised way, on a mix of active and passive components using a full or partial pull mode.
ActiveDataConnector() - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
 
ActiveDataConnector(int) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
creates a new connector with some data buffer capacity, and with the default behavior of being both an active puller and pusher with minimum intervals between each push and each pull of 100 milliseconds.
ActiveDataConnector(int, boolean, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class fr.upmc.components.connectors.ActiveDataConnector
creates a new active connector and fully configure it.
